```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

import a dataset.

```{r}
litters_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

look at your data!

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Update the names in `litters_df`.

```{r}
litters_df =
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

look at data!
```{r}
litters_df
```

Sometimes skimming data is neat?

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

## Fix the missingness

```{r}
litters_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", ".", ""), skip = 1)
```
